channel.title: New lvl 99 magic spell for a second full bar spec ! ERROS PLZ HELP!

item.title: New lvl 99 magic spell for a second full bar spec ! ERROS PLZ HELP!
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

IN clickingmost.java <<

case 73172:
if (c.donator <= 1){
c.sM(“You must be a LEGEND to use this Second spec”);
return;
}
if (c.specialAmount >= 200) {
c.sM(“You already are BOOSTED UP!!”);
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.mageDelay < 120000){
c.mageDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sM(“you can only cast BOOST SPEC every 2 minutes.”);
return;
}
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.vengDelay < 120000){
c.sM(“You can only cast BOOST SPEC 2 minutes after a vengeance spell.”);
return;
}
if(c.playerHasItem(4278, 5000)){
if(c.playerLevel[6] >= 99){
c.specialAmount += 100;
c.specAttack();
c.savegame(true);
c.disconnected = false;
c.deleteItem(4278, 5000);
} else
c.sM(“You need a magic level of 99 or better to cast this spell.”);
} else
c.sM(“You need 5k Ecto-tockens to cast this spell.”);
break;

can anyone help me with this i tried to do a luna spell to give a full spec bar
theres a bug that the person can have the runes and keep on refilling their spec so they can keep on specing
this is what i want out of this spell.

requirements:
99 mage
donator = 2
5k ecto-tokens (id nubmer 4278)
has to wait 120 seconds from previous mage spell cast and also veng cast before activating
has to have a special amount lower than 200 so cast

can anyone help me?
this took me 10 minutes to figure out =]

another thing i would like the spec bar to be refreshed before and after login so that no one can abuse if there is a bug

Read full topic
item.source: New lvl 99 magic spell for a second full bar spec ! ERROS PLZ HELP!
